text: Oh, man.

It's the first time, I've seen all my cars in the UK. On the track
What a view!
Oh my lord! Jesus..
How nice, seeing all my baby's out for the day, together for the first time.
Amazing.
Amazing, amazing, amazing.
What a beauty.
Shall we try this one first?
Right, the first time all the beautiful cars are out for the day together.
Time to get sweaty, so if you would be kind enough to do me a favour,
and get out the fu***ing way.

It's like driving as fast as a roller coaster you've ever been on.

Oh my god, that is insane. No?

Beautiful. Boom.
My Porsche 918. A 4.6 liter, V8 engine, with 2 electric motors.
This is no Prius. 0 to 60 in 2.5 seconds,
this spider has some bite.
This just gets better and better and better. Oh my god.
Now this is what I call a car.
Every time I sit in this incredible car,
It gives me chills.
With only 200 made on the planet,

Some of the most amazing cars. My new, vintage,
